languages.text: "Если я верно помню "Житие Надин Алейников", то речь о чистоте. Ее святая чтила как квинтэссенцию прочих добродетелей".

traits.locale_text: "Если я верно помню "Житие Надин Алейников", то речь о чистоте. Ее святая чтила как квинтэссенцию прочих добродетелей".

languages.text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
languages.original_text: "Если я верно помню "Житие Надин Алейников", то речь о чистоте. Ее святая чтила как квинтэссенцию прочих добродетелей".

traits.locale_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
"If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

languages.text: «Si no recuerdo mal las páginas de la Vida de Nadine Aleynikova, en esta parte se habla de la pureza. La santa la veía como la quintaesencia de todas las demás virtudes».
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

traits.locale_text: «Si no recuerdo mal las páginas de la Vida de Nadine Aleynikov, en esta parte se habla de la pureza. La santa la veía como la quintaesencia de todas las demás virtudes».

languages.text: 「ナディン・アレイニコフの生涯のページに書いてあったことを思い出す限り、この部分はピュリティについて語っています。聖人はそれを、他のすべての美徳の真髄とみなしたのです」
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

traits.locale_text: 「ナディン・アレイニコフの生涯のページに書いてあったことを思い出す限り、この部分はピュリティについて語っています。聖人はそれを、他のすべての美徳の真髄とみなしたのです」

languages.text: “如果我没记错的话，这段话节选自《纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫的一生》。这部分讲的是纯洁的重要性，那位圣人认为纯洁是其他一切美德的精华。”
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

traits.locale_text: “如果我没记错的话，这段话节选自《纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫的一生》。这部分讲的是纯洁的重要性，那位圣人认为纯洁是其他一切美德的精华。”

languages.text: "Wenn ich 'Das Leben von Nadine Aleynikov' richtig in Erinnerung habe, geht es in diesem Teil um Reinheit. Die Heilige betrachtete sie als Quintessenz aller anderen Tugenden."
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich 'Das Leben von Nadine Aleynikov' richtig in Erinnerung habe, geht es in diesem Teil um Reinheit. Die Heilige betrachtete sie als Quintessenz aller anderen Tugenden."

languages.text: « Si je me souviens bien des pages de La vie de Nadine Aleynikov, cette section parle de pureté. La sainte voyait en cette vertu la quintessence de toutes les autres. »
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."

traits.locale_text: « Si je me souviens bien des pages de La vie de Nadine Aleynikov, cette section parle de pureté. La sainte voyait en cette vertu la quintessence de toutes les autres. »

languages.text: "Nadine Aleynikov'un Hayatı'nın sayfalarında yazıya dökülenleri doğru hatırlıyorsam burada saflıktan bahsediliyor. Aziz, bunu diğer erdemlerin özü olarak görüyor."
languages.original_text: "If I recall the pages of Life of Nadine Aleynikov correctly, this part speaks about purity. The saint saw it as the quintessence of all other virtues."
